page.title: 17E.Horsley S. Clubs
page.content:
A Good Neighbour scheme run by all the Churches covers the whole of E.Hors- ley. Newcomers are welcomed by a vol- untary road steward who provides a leaflet giving details of the village & its activities & inviting them to the church of their choice. He/she is also responsible for informing the clergy of any births, sickness or death, so that a visit can be made and/or gift of flowers as appropriate.
A Toddlers Club is run in St. Martin's Church Hall, and Girl Guides and Brownies meet there. E.Horsley Out- door Bowling Club is surrounded by small bungalows & sheltered housing. It is owned & maintained by Guildford Borough Council, who provided a very pleasant club house in 1976 which it rents to the Club.
